Quote.Author: Gilda Radner
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm so full I can't hear

Quote.Author: Gilda Radner
Quote.QuoteValue: Having cancer gave me membership in an elite club I'd rather not belong to

Quote.Author: Gilda Radner
Quote.QuoteValue: I would say that Lucy, 'I Love Lucy,' she was my idol

Quote.Author: Gilda Radner
Quote.QuoteValue: Fame changes a lot of things, but it can't change a lightbulb

Quote.Author: Gillian Jacobs
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Fresh Air' I listen to, like, every day

Quote.Author: Gillian Jacobs
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not conservative, but I am kind of clean living in my own life

Quote.Author: Gillian Jacobs
Quote.QuoteValue: You can convey a lot of emotion with just some eyebrows and mouth movement

Quote.Author: Gillian Jacobs
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody knows what the future is except for wizards

Quote.Author: Gillian Jacobs
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the 'Moth' podcast a lot. I listen to that

Quote.Author: Gillian Jacobs
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of my friends are guys, so I'm used to bro antics

Quote.Author: Gillian Jacobs
Quote.QuoteValue: I troll Instagram, Style.com, Elle.com

Quote.Author: Gillian Jacobs
Quote.QuoteValue: Things are never simple when it comes to the human heart

Quote.Author: Gillian Jacobs
Quote.QuoteValue: We're all slight hypocrites who fall short of our ideals

Quote.Author: Gillian Jacobs
Quote.QuoteValue: We all wish there were more 'Bridesmaids' out there

Quote.Author: Gina Bellman
Quote.QuoteValue: I love those connections that make this big old world feel like a little village

Quote.Author: Gina Bellman
Quote.QuoteValue: Any friendship or relationship is about a language

Quote.Author: Gina Bellman
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like crowds or attention

Quote.Author: Gina Bellman
Quote.QuoteValue: French cinema allows women to look... a certain way and be talented at the same time

Quote.Author: Gina Bellman
Quote.QuoteValue: I love acting, and I have no desire to direct

Quote.Author: Gina Bellman
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a big comedy fan, having been in 'Coupling.'

Quote.Author: Gina Bellman
Quote.QuoteValue: My all-time favourite programme is 'Seinfeld;' I could just sit and watch that over and over again

Quote.Author: Gina Bellman
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the things you have to get used to, working on a TV show, is filming out of sync

Quote.Author: Gina Bellman
Quote.QuoteValue: Every name in a TV show has to be run by the legal department first

Quote.Author: Gina Bellman
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother always said I should have a back-up profession if the acting doesn't work out

Quote.Author: Gina Gershon
Quote.QuoteValue: Size counts. That's all

Quote.Author: Gina Gershon
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't quite know how drunk you are until all of a sudden you're on the floor

Quote.Author: Gina Gershon
Quote.QuoteValue: My best attribute is knowing when not to answer stupid questions

Quote.Author: Gina Gershon
Quote.QuoteValue: Feeding is a very important ritual for me. I don't trust people who don't like to eat

Quote.Author: Gina Gershon
Quote.QuoteValue: I always find people who are unique very attractive

Quote.Author: Gina Gershon
Quote.QuoteValue: Struggling at anything that you want to be doing is hard

Quote.Author: Gina Gershon
Quote.QuoteValue: The critics tend to forget their own answers after a while

Quote.Author: Gina Gershon
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned a lot about critics, not to really take them too seriously about movies

Quote.Author: Gina Gershon
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have any blonde friends

Quote.Author: Gina Gershon
Quote.QuoteValue: In any profession, there's a sleazy side and an honorable side

Quote.Author: Gina Raimondo
Quote.QuoteValue: The single greatest under-utilized resource we have as a nation is women and girls

Quote.Author: Gina Raimondo
Quote.QuoteValue: We know businesses can't compete without reliable infrastructure

Quote.Author: Gina Raimondo
Quote.QuoteValue: I fall into the camp that income inequality is the biggest problem we face

Quote.Author: Gina Raimondo
Quote.QuoteValue: The public library is where I studied. It's where my grandfather taught himself English

Quote.Author: Gina Raimondo
Quote.QuoteValue: We have to slowly, carefully, and thoughtfully align all of our interests

Quote.Author: Gina Raimondo
Quote.QuoteValue: My vision for a better Rhode Island starts with a simple idea - we are all in this together

Quote.Author: Gina Raimondo
Quote.QuoteValue: The difference between a dream and a goal is a deadline

Quote.Author: Gina Raimondo
Quote.QuoteValue: I care about buses and libraries and schools and roads and education

Quote.Author: Gina Raimondo
Quote.QuoteValue: We need a collective moment where we commit ourselves to long-term solutions

Quote.Author: Gina Raimondo
Quote.QuoteValue: We've just got to keep going. More. More work, more action, more results

Quote.Author: Ginger Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: My love for ice cream emerged at an early age - and has never left!

Quote.Author: Ginger Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: Looking back at my life's voyage, I can only say that it has been a golden trip

Quote.Author: Ginger Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to feed my hunger rather than my appetite

Quote.Author: Ginger Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: When two people love each other, they don't look at each other, they look in the same direction

Quote.Author: Ginger Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: The only way to enjoy anything in this life is to earn it first

Quote.Author: Ginger Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: I yearned for a long, happy marriage with one person

Quote.Author: Ginger Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: Only I know my life

Quote.Author: Ginger Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: Gossip is hardly uplifting

Quote.Author: Ginger Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: The kids today, they think they can dance with their faces

Quote.Author: Ginger Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: People are still people no matter how you cut it

Quote.Author: Ginni Rometty
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't let others define you. You define yourself

Quote.Author: Ginni Rometty
Quote.QuoteValue: Growth and comfort do not coexist

Quote.Author: Ginni Rometty
Quote.QuoteValue: Never love something so much that you can't let go of it

Quote.Author: Ginni Rometty
Quote.QuoteValue: Be first and be lonely

Quote.Author: Ginni Rometty
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're clear on what you believe, you have a great foundation to go make a market

Quote.Author: Ginni Rometty
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned to always take on things I'd never done before

Quote.Author: Ginni Rometty
Quote.QuoteValue: When you remove layers, simplicity and speed happen

Quote.Author: Ginni Rometty
Quote.QuoteValue: Every part of your business will change based on what I consider predictive analytics of the future

Quote.Author: Ginni Rometty
Quote.QuoteValue: I think, given who the IBM target company is, I feel our purpose is to be essential to our clients

Quote.Author: Ginni Rometty
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't protect your past. Don't protect your products

Quote.Author: Giorgio Moroder
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think there is too much art involved in what I do

Quote.Author: Giorgio Moroder
Quote.QuoteValue: The disco sound, you must see, is not art or anything so serious

Quote.Author: Giorgio Moroder
Quote.QuoteValue: Phil Ramone is very special. Barbra Streisand or Diana Ross... they are the best

Quote.Author: Giorgio Moroder
Quote.QuoteValue: I would not be happy to do what I do unless I felt that the large audience wanted it

Quote.Author: Giorgio Moroder
Quote.QuoteValue: Disco is music for dancing, and people will always want to dance

Quote.Author: Giorgio Moroder
Quote.QuoteValue: My music was typically continental - nothing like, say, The Beatles

Quote.Author: Giorgio Moroder
Quote.QuoteValue: I am much more happy doing what I know I can do than what I am not sure I could do

Quote.Author: Giorgio Moroder
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to admit, I do not listen to much rock music

Quote.Author: Giorgio Moroder
Quote.QuoteValue: I am reluctant to judge things without being informed

Quote.Author: Giorgio Moroder
Quote.QuoteValue: I am certainly not racist; I even like the British

Quote.Author: Gisele Bundchen
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like when people judge me they're not judging me, because they don't know who I am

Quote.Author: Gisele Bundchen
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes siblings can get in each other's space

Quote.Author: Gisele Bundchen
Quote.QuoteValue: It's unfortunate that in an interview sometimes things can seem so black and white

Quote.Author: Gisele Bundchen
Quote.QuoteValue: People think if you look after yourself you're being selfish, you know

Quote.Author: Gisele Bundchen
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as I'm a good person and I do things from the heart, that's all that matters

Quote.Author: Gisele Bundchen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not an actress, you know. I don't know what's going on. And I'm supposed to be the villain

Quote.Author: Gisele Bundchen
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a huge fan of big cotton underpants; they're comfortable. I wear them every day

Quote.Author: Gisele Bundchen
Quote.QuoteValue: I love outdoor sports, like volleyball, and I play them whenever I can

Quote.Author: Gisele Bundchen
Quote.QuoteValue: Children are like little angels - there's no way you can't love them

Quote.Author: Gisele Bundchen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a very hyper person

Quote.Author: Glenn Beck
Quote.QuoteValue: We all have our inner demons

Quote.Author: Glenn Beck
Quote.QuoteValue: Without failure there is no sweetness in success. There's no understanding of it

Quote.Author: Glenn Beck
Quote.QuoteValue: Remember, beneath every cynic there lies a romantic, and probably an injured one

Quote.Author: Glenn Beck
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that if we get out of people's way, the sky's the limit. The sky is the limit

Quote.Author: Glenn Beck
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a conservative, but I am not a zombie

Quote.Author: Glenn Beck
Quote.QuoteValue: Political Correctness doesn't change us, it shuts us up

Quote.Author: Glenn Beck
Quote.QuoteValue: What we don't have a right to is healthcare, housing, or handouts. We don't have those rights

Quote.Author: Glenn Beck
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have a priest that is pushing social justice, go find another parish. Go alert your bishop

Quote.Author: Glenn Beck
Quote.QuoteValue: You can get rich making fun of me. I know. I've made lots of money making fun of me

Quote.Author: Glenn Beck
Quote.QuoteValue: We just put General Motors in the hands of people who can't even run our own government

Quote.Author: Glenn Danzig
Quote.QuoteValue: To some people heavy metal is Motorhead and to others it's Judas Priest

Quote.Author: Glenn Danzig
Quote.QuoteValue: I just told you I wasn't a Satanist

Quote.Author: Glenn Danzig
Quote.QuoteValue: I was bringing my attitude as a regular person 'cause this is my attitude

Quote.Author: Glenn Danzig
Quote.QuoteValue: But unfortunately, I have to say, one out of every 100 interviews I do, I get a real journalist

Quote.Author: Glenn Danzig
Quote.QuoteValue: Of course, I started really being a comics fan with the underground stuff in the '70s

Quote.Author: Glenn Danzig
Quote.QuoteValue: Yeah, now we publish whenever we feel like it

Quote.Author: Glenn Danzig
Quote.QuoteValue: We still have pretty good sales, especially for the art books

Quote.Author: Glenn Danzig
Quote.QuoteValue: We've had a lot of agencies try and sabotage our tour

Quote.Author: Glenn Danzig
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just saying that at least for the foreseeable future there won't be any more touring

Quote.Author: Glenn Danzig
Quote.QuoteValue: I know they are going to be doing a box set in Europe of Danzig 5 and 6 and some other stuff

Quote.Author: Gloria Estefan
Quote.QuoteValue: The sad truth is that opportunity doesn't knock twice

Quote.Author: Gloria Estefan
Quote.QuoteValue: Motherhood is... difficult and... rewarding

Quote.Author: Gloria Estefan
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to believe. Never be afraid to dream

Quote.Author: Gloria Estefan
Quote.QuoteValue: You can put things off until tomorrow but tomorrow may never come

Quote.Author: Gloria Estefan
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever it is your heart desires, please go for it, it's yours to have

Quote.Author: Gloria Estefan
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of the way I sing is playing off other musicians. It's what I love to do the most

Quote.Author: Gloria Estefan
Quote.QuoteValue: We seal our fate with the choices we take, but don't give a second thought to the chances we take

Quote.Author: Gloria Estefan
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a very open line of communication with both my children

Quote.Author: Gloria Estefan
Quote.QuoteValue: We protect aspirin bottles in this country better than we protect guns from accidents by children

Quote.Author: Gloria Estefan
Quote.QuoteValue: In this life, I'm always going to choose the positive

Quote.Author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo
Quote.QuoteValue: I sow; my successor reaps. This is the majesty of democracy

Quote.Author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo
Quote.QuoteValue: In the time one is given, the steward must make the most of the talents one is given by the Lord

Quote.Author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo
Quote.QuoteValue: Now I ask you to make your sacrifice. Take a gamble. I took the plunge and I'm glad of it

Quote.Author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not worried. I'm in control

Quote.Author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo
Quote.QuoteValue: The roof cannot collapse when the value pillars of government and society are sound and strong

Quote.Author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo
Quote.QuoteValue: In the harshest possible terms, I condemn political killings

Quote.Author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo
Quote.QuoteValue: We must weed out corruption and build a strong system of justice that the people can trust

Quote.Author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo
Quote.QuoteValue: In my presidency I've been guided by what's right, not what's popular

Quote.Author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo
Quote.QuoteValue: Filipino businessmen must have the ability to compete freely in the global economy

Quote.Author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo
Quote.QuoteValue: I can say that I have not done any culpable violation of the constitution

Quote.Author: Gloria Swanson
Quote.QuoteValue: At 26 I felt myself a victim rather than a victor in the realm of pictures

Quote.Author: Gloria Swanson
Quote.QuoteValue: Life and death. They are somehow sweetly and beautifully mixed, but I don't know how

Quote.Author: Gloria Swanson
Quote.QuoteValue: I've given my memoirs far more thought than any of my marriages. You can't divorce a book

Quote.Author: Gloria Swanson
Quote.QuoteValue: As Daddy said, life is 95 percent anticipation

Quote.Author: Gloria Swanson
Quote.QuoteValue: By the time I was 15, my mother had turned me into a real clotheshorse

Quote.Author: Gloria Swanson
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother and I could always look out the same window without ever seeing the same thing

Quote.Author: Gloria Swanson
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody gets anything for nothing

Quote.Author: Gloria Swanson
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the networks sent me a TV set to watch. I didn't care for the medium. It depressed me

Quote.Author: Gloria Swanson
Quote.QuoteValue: Tennessee Williams was a gifted talker with a beautiful accent and we had lots of things in common

Quote.Author: Gloria Swanson
Quote.QuoteValue: The English press treated the world premiere of my first talking picture as a major event

Quote.Author: Golda Meir
Quote.QuoteValue: One cannot and must not try to erase the past merely because it does not fit the present

Quote.Author: Golda Meir
Quote.QuoteValue: You'll never find a better sparring partner than adversity

Quote.Author: Golda Meir
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who don't know how to weep with their whole heart, don't know how to laugh either

Quote.Author: Golda Meir
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't be humble... you're not that great

Quote.Author: Golda Meir
Quote.QuoteValue: Pessimism is a luxury that a Jew can never allow himself

Quote.Author: Golda Meir
Quote.QuoteValue: We Jews have a secret weapon in our struggle with the Arabs; we have no place to go

Quote.Author: Golda Meir
Quote.QuoteValue: The dog that trots about finds a bone

Quote.Author: Golda Meir
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't thrive on military acts. We do them because we have to, and thank God we are efficient

Quote.Author: Golda Meir
Quote.QuoteValue: I must govern the clock, not be governed by it

Quote.Author: Golda Meir
Quote.QuoteValue: To be successful, a woman has to be much better at her job than a man

Quote.Author: Goldie Hawn
Quote.QuoteValue: I have witnessed the softening of the hardest of hearts by a simple smile

Quote.Author: Goldie Hawn
Quote.QuoteValue: The biggest lesson we have to give our children is truth

Quote.Author: Goldie Hawn
Quote.QuoteValue: So curiosity, I think, is a really important aspect of staying young or youthful

Quote.Author: Goldie Hawn
Quote.QuoteValue: A body smiles, like, 72 times a day. Where does that smile go? That's what I want to know

Quote.Author: Goldie Hawn
Quote.QuoteValue: One way to feel good about yourself is to love yourself... to take care of yourself

Quote.Author: Goldie Hawn
Quote.QuoteValue: Ditzy dumb blonde? I can be ditzy. I can be

Quote.Author: Goldie Hawn
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not afraid of my femininity and I'm not afraid of my sexuality

Quote.Author: Goldie Hawn
Quote.QuoteValue: To find someone who loves your children like you do is really rare

Quote.Author: Goldie Hawn
Quote.QuoteValue: We have to embrace obstacles to reach the next stage of joy

Quote.Author: Goldie Hawn
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe having religion in your life creates the potential for long-lasting relationships

Quote.Author: Gordon B. Hinckley
Quote.QuoteValue: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds

Quote.Author: Gordon B. Hinckley
Quote.QuoteValue: Every good citizen adds to the strength of a nation

Quote.Author: Gordon B. Hinckley
Quote.QuoteValue: The smallest gesture can mean to much to those who may need a little lift in their lives

Quote.Author: Gordon B. Hinckley
Quote.QuoteValue: Every sacrament meeting ought to be a spiritual feast

Quote.Author: Gordon B. Hinckley
Quote.QuoteValue: Conflict grows out of ignorance and suspicion

Quote.Author: Gordon B. Hinckley
Quote.QuoteValue: A tattoo is graffiti on the temple of the body

Quote.Author: Gordon B. Hinckley
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep your families close together, and love and honor your children

Quote.Author: Gordon B. Hinckley
Quote.QuoteValue: Eternal vigilance is the price of eternal development

Quote.Author: Gordon B. Hinckley
Quote.QuoteValue: You will find peace and happiness if you will live the gospel

Quote.Author: Gordon B. Hinckley
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is precious. Life is sacred. And it ought so to be observed

Quote.Author: Gordon Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: When something really matters, you should never give up or give in

Quote.Author: Gordon Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: When things are difficult, you have to be sure of who you are and what you want to achieve

Quote.Author: Gordon Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing that you could say to me now that I could ever believe

Quote.Author: Gordon Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: People believe in the power of education to change lives

Quote.Author: Gordon Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to live in the future, not the past

Quote.Author: Gordon Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a father; that's what matters most. Nothing matters more

Quote.Author: Gordon Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Globalisation feels like a runaway train, out of control

Quote.Author: Gordon Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Famously, I'm somewhat impatient

Quote.Author: Gordon Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: For centuries, individuals have been learning how to live with their next-door neighbours

Quote.Author: Gordon Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that our vote is both a public duty and a sacred trust

Quote.Author: Gordon Ramsay
Quote.QuoteValue: Cooking today is a young man's game, I don't give a bollocks what anyone says

Quote.Author: Gordon Ramsay
Quote.QuoteValue: Kitchens are hard environments and they form incredibly strong characters

Quote.Author: Gordon Ramsay
Quote.QuoteValue: When you cook under pressure you trade perfection

Quote.Author: Gordon Ramsay
Quote.QuoteValue: I hid myself in food

Quote.Author: Gordon Ramsay
Quote.QuoteValue: I am what I am. A fighter

Quote.Author: Gordon Ramsay
Quote.QuoteValue: I cook, I create, I'm incredibly excited by what I do, I've still got a lot to achieve

Quote.Author: Gordon Ramsay
Quote.QuoteValue: The minute you start compromising for the sake of massaging somebody's ego, that's it, game over

Quote.Author: Gordon Ramsay
Quote.QuoteValue: They say cats have nine lives. I've had 12 already and I don't know how many more I'll have

Quote.Author: Gordon Ramsay
Quote.QuoteValue: No one saw the recession coming

Quote.Author: Gordon Ramsay
Quote.QuoteValue: If I relaxed, if I took my foot off the gas, I would probably die

Quote.Author: Grace Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I was skinny as a rail and had high cheekbones and a very interesting face - or so I was told

Quote.Author: Grace Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I've turned down millions of dollars to go on reality TV. It's an absolute no-go

Quote.Author: Grace Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I never thought I was going to be a singer. That was an accident

Quote.Author: Grace Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to think of myself as a positive person. Otherwise I wouldn't have had a child

Quote.Author: Grace Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: One creates oneself

Quote.Author: Grace Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't expect your children to be perfect

Quote.Author: Grace Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't collaborate. You're born alone, you die alone, you get on stage alone

Quote.Author: Grace Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a rock star; I'm a soft person

Quote.Author: Grace Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always rebelling. I don't think I'll ever stop

Quote.Author: Grace Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Normally, I stay away from politics - unless I'm going to run for president

Quote.Author: Grace Slick
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't have to wear fur. They make such great fakes. There's no reason to kill an animal

Quote.Author: Grace Slick
Quote.QuoteValue: No matter how big or soft or warm your bed is, you still have to get out of it

Quote.Author: Grace Slick
Quote.QuoteValue: If I were gay, life would be a lot simpler. I'm kind of annoyed that I'm not

Quote.Author: Grace Slick
Quote.QuoteValue: Things change so fast, you can't use 1971 ethics on someone born in 1971

Quote.Author: Grace Slick
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone who's 71 years old would look ridiculous singing rock

Quote.Author: Grace Slick
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to see old people doing rap or rock and roll. It makes me cringe

Quote.Author: Grace Slick
Quote.QuoteValue: When you get older, it's not about what you did that you regret, it's what you didn't do

Quote.Author: Grace Slick
Quote.QuoteValue: I do what I love to do, what I choose to do

Quote.Author: Grace Slick
Quote.QuoteValue: Death is like taking an intermission when you can't come back. I like living and being around

Quote.Author: Grace Slick
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a commercial artist, both in music and art

Quote.Author: Graham Greene
Quote.QuoteValue: Human nature is not black and white but black and grey

Quote.Author: Graham Greene
Quote.QuoteValue: Sentimentality - that's what we call the sentiment we don't share

Quote.Author: Graham Greene
Quote.QuoteValue: There is always one moment in childhood when the door opens and lets the future in

Quote.Author: Graham Greene
Quote.QuoteValue: When we are not sure, we are alive

Quote.Author: Graham Greene
Quote.QuoteValue: They are always saying God loves us. If that's love I'd rather have a bit of kindness

Quote.Author: Graham Greene
Quote.QuoteValue: Heresy is another word for freedom of thought

Quote.Author: Graham Greene
Quote.QuoteValue: Innocence is like a dumb leper who has lost his bell, wandering the world, meaning no harm

Quote.Author: Graham Greene
Quote.QuoteValue: In human relationships, kindness and lies are worth a thousand truths

Quote.Author: Graham Greene
Quote.QuoteValue: Media is just a word that has come to mean bad journalism

Quote.Author: Graham Greene
Quote.QuoteValue: Reality in our century is not something to be faced

Quote.Author: Graydon Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: Every man in the back of their minds would like to own a bar or a racehorse

Quote.Author: Graydon Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: Magazines at some point become hostage to their own success

Quote.Author: Graydon Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: Television has the obvious benefits of regularity and intimacy

Quote.Author: Graydon Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: To a young kid growing up in Canada, America seemed to be crazy about the future; dazzled by it

Quote.Author: Graydon Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: I actually don't know how magazines are produced, I'll be honest with you. I have no idea

Quote.Author: Graydon Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is all about seating and lighting

Quote.Author: Graydon Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: We really care about photography at 'Vanity Fair.'

Quote.Author: Graydon Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: History is nothing if not an epic tale of missed opportunities

Quote.Author: Graydon Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: I think Americans, more so than any other culture, love second and third acts

Quote.Author: Graydon Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: The shelf life of a movie actor or actress is so short, it's like milk

Quote.Author: Greg Boyle
Quote.QuoteValue: Even gang members imagine a future that doesn't include gangs

Quote.Author: Greg Boyle
Quote.QuoteValue: Ours is a God who waits. So who are we not to?

Quote.Author: Greg Boyle
Quote.QuoteValue: I kinda don't do guilt. I gave it up for Lent years ago

Quote.Author: Greg Boyle
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the priest who has been mistaken for an ATM machine

Quote.Author: Greg Boyle
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never seen a hopeful person join a gang

Quote.Author: Greg Boyle
Quote.QuoteValue: Young people can change and grow. Every parent knows that

Quote.Author: Greg Boyle
Quote.QuoteValue: Redemption is possible, and it is the measure of a civilized society

Quote.Author: Greg Boyle
Quote.QuoteValue: You are exactly what God had in mind when he made you

Quote.Author: Greg Boyle
Quote.QuoteValue: You are so much more than the worst thing you've ever done

Quote.Author: Greg Boyle
Quote.QuoteValue: The margins don't get erased by simply insisting that the powers-that-be erase them

Quote.Author: Greg Gutfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Travel like a pro, not like a hobo. That's my motto

Quote.Author: Greg Gutfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Getting mad only leads to madness

Quote.Author: Greg Gutfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: It's pointless to get all huffy about stuff

Quote.Author: Greg Gutfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: I've said it before: If Queen had died and reincarnated as one person, it would be Devin Townsend

Quote.Author: Greg Gutfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: For trance music to be good, it has to sneak up on you

Quote.Author: Greg Gutfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Trump says what he thinks at that moment. He's a totem pole of transparency

Quote.Author: Greg Gutfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: As the Left demean law-abiding gun owners, they turn flaccid when faced with the armed felon

Quote.Author: Greg Gutfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Youthful impatience obscures the endless potential for joy that's standing right in front of you

Quote.Author: Greg Gutfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Wherever socialism spread, misery followed - and still follows

Quote.Author: Greg Gutfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Before there was radical Islam, immigration and terror didn't mix

Quote.Author: Greg Rucka
Quote.QuoteValue: Heroes are defined by their villains - Batman is nothing if he doesn't have Two-Face

Quote.Author: Greg Rucka
Quote.QuoteValue: I love doing research. It's like cheating, but with permission

Quote.Author: Greg Rucka
Quote.QuoteValue: I love 'The Omen,' just as a piece of plotting

Quote.Author: Greg Rucka
Quote.QuoteValue: I think Batman has the Wolverine problem. I think he's overexposed

Quote.Author: Greg Rucka
Quote.QuoteValue: I am the product of Denny O'Neil in many ways, I carry forth a lot of what Denny instilled in me

Quote.Author: Greg Rucka
Quote.QuoteValue: I come from a prose background. I come from short story background, and that led me into novels
